availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Boone County, Kentucky, housewife. Kentucky native. Married to Allen Wilhoit. Mother of of William Wilhoit, Mary Anne Wilhoit, Caroline Wilhoit, Richard A. Wilhoit, Frances Wilhoit, Amanda Wilhoit, and Elizabeth Wilhoit. Housewife in Kentucky in 1850. Housewife in Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, District no. 2, p. 218.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Florence District, p. 261.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Florence, p. 187.
Find A Grave, "Lucinda Wilhoit (1807-1885)," Memorial # 134722894, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/134722894 (accessed October 18, 2018).
